snippet: Winning has never been a problem for Bobby Petrino, but the Arkansas coach’s disclosure of a relationship with a young employee after a motorcycle crash has put new focus on his character.
abstract: Fallout continues for Arkansas football coach Bobby Petrino after a motorcycle crash and the disclosure of a relationship with a young employee puts new focus on his character; nobody questions Petrino's coaching acumen, but the Arkansas program has been thrown into turmoil because of his judgment.

byline.original: By ADAM HIMMELSBACH and PETE THAMEL

lead_paragraph: Winning has never been a problem for Bobby Petrino, but the Arkansas coach’s disclosure of a relationship with a young employee after a motorcycle crash has put new focus on his character.

headline.seo: Arkansas Scrambles as Petrino Scandal Goes Beyond X’s and O’s
headline.main: Scandal Involving Petrino Goes Beyond X’s and O’s
headline.print_headline: At Arkansas, Fallout Continues After Crash
